title: The SCAM of Wireless ESD Straps - Feat. ElectroBOOM
tags: Don't get scammed by wireless ESD straps
do I have to wear an ESD strap?
description: Better sleep makes a better you! Check out Eight Sleep at   (code LMG) for $150 off the Pod Cover  For a limited time, download Asphalt 9 Legends and get a free Lamborghini Revuelto! Check it out at   We put wired and wireless anti-static wrist bands to the test with help from ElectroBOOM. Its not just about shocking Linus, its educational, too!  Special Thanks to ElectroBOOM, check out his channel here:   Buy an iFixit Anti-Static Wrist Strap:  Buy a DESCO Wrist Strap Tester:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Check out ESD Standard Documents: ANSI/ESD S20.20-2021  ANSI/ESD S1.1-2021  IEC 61340-4-6:2015  *Paid Downloads  Discuss on the forum:     GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   OUR WAN PODCAST GEAR:   FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0   Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 1:58 ESD Strap Design 2:28 Multimeter Test 4:47 ElectroBOOM's Tests 6:25 The Struggle is Real 7:25 More Testing 12:44 Feeling the Wind 17:22 What about wireless? 23:00 What's Inside? 28:49 Outro  #LTT #electroboom
